name: Ornua Co-operative Limited
goal: To produce, market and sell dairy and dairy-related products on behalf of its co-operative members.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives:
CAP policies and legislation of direct relevance to the intra and extra-EU trade of dairy and related agri-food products.
EU Trade Policy
Brexit
